description: User is giving feedback (performance, code review, deliverable).

tones.professional:
INTENT: Give feedback.

Replace generic phrases with specifics. 'Làm tốt' → specific achievement. 'Cố gắng hơn' → specific behavior change. Be actionable.

TONE: Professional. Specific, constructive, actionable.

STRUCTURE: Specific positive (if any). Specific areas to improve with concrete suggestions. Maximum 4-5 sentences.
tones.direct: INTENT: Give feedback. Specific observations. Actionable direction. Maximum 3-4 sentences.
tones.warm: INTENT: Give feedback. Warm but specific. Maximum 4 sentences.
tones.formal: INTENT: Give feedback. Formal, structured. Maximum 5 sentences.
